# Overview
This is my first attempt to create the coursework website.

## Getting Started
# The Data
# First Visualisation


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse)

exam_data <- read_csv("chap01/data/Exam_data.csv")

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20) +
    facet_wrap(~ CLASS)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, 
           x= GENDER)) +
  geom_boxplot() +                    
  geom_point(position="jitter", 
             size = 0.5)        
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, 
           y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method=lm, 
              linewidth=0.5)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-3.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, 
           x= GENDER)) +
  geom_violin()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-4.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x = MATHS)) +
  geom_dotplot(dotsize = 0.5)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-5.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, 
           fill = GENDER)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20, 
                 color="grey30")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-6.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x = MATHS, 
           colour = GENDER)) +
  geom_density()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-7.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, 
           x= GENDER)) +
  geom_boxplot(notch=TRUE)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-8.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, x= GENDER)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_point(stat="summary",        
             fun="mean",           
             colour="red",          
             size=4)          
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-9.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x=RACE)) +
  geom_bar() +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_minimal()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-10.png){width=672}
:::
:::
